note.p: House agent. Moved to Tromer Lodge, Down, in 1862. Formerly resident in Clapham. Convicted of smoking in a first-class carriage in 1863.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/83/65/67)
Correspondence vol. 10, letter from J. B. Innes to T. S. Stephens, [before 5 May 1862], letter to J. B. Innes, 22 December [1862]
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 March 2020)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 March 2020)
letter from H. E. Darwin to W. E. Darwin, [22 February 1863] (DAR 210.6: 109)
